structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Registry may appoint employees, adopt regulations, hold hearings.

text.section: The Registry of Election Finance shall appoint such employees as are necessary to provide the service to carry out all purposes of KRS 61.710 to 61.780, including an attorney or attorneys on a full or part-time basis.
